Meeting of Front-rankers in Songun Revolution to Be Held 
   Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- A meeting of front-rankers in the Songun revolution will be held here in February Juche 96 (2007).
 The meeting will bring together servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, officials and working people who have distinguished themselves in the struggle to foil the imperialists' moves for a nuclear war and sanctions and pressure against the DPRK and glorify the dignity and honor of Juche Korea by performing miracles and heroic feats in socialist construction, true to the Songun revolutionary leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.    
 The meeting will review the shining achievements and experience gained by the servicepersons and people of the DPRK in the political, military, economic and cultural and all other fields, single-mindedly united around the Party since the meeting for the general march of the Songun revolution. It will discuss tasks to be undertaken to give full play to the mettle of the nuclear weapons state, increase the national power of Juche Korea in every way and more dynamically accelerate the building of a great prosperous powerful socialist nation and ways to do so.
